meanings.sent1: I will decimalize the fractions for easier calculation.
meanings.sent2: It is important to decimalize the measurements for accuracy.
meanings.sent3: Why did the math book break up with the calculator? It wanted to decimalize things on its own!
meanings.sent4: She had the ability to decimalize complex concepts into simple terms.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's explanation helped me understand how to decimalize the numbers.

meanings.sent1: Can you decimalize this fraction into a decimal number?
meanings.sent2: It is easier to decimalize percentages for comparison.
meanings.sent3: The joke was so funny, it made me want to decimalize my laughter!
meanings.sent4: Her eyes seemed to decimalize the emotions she was feeling.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting was able to decimalize the beauty of nature.
